question.text:
Given below are two statements :
Statement I :
Sickle cell anaemia and Haemophilia are autosomal dominant traits .
Statement II :
Sickle cell anaemia and Haemophilia are disorders of the blood.
In the light of the above statements, choose the correct answer from the options given below :

options.text: Both Statement I and Statement II are correct
Both Statement I and Statement II are incorrect
Statement I is correct but Statement II is incorrect
Statement I is incorrect but Statement II is correct

solution.text:
Sickle cell anemia is autosomal recessive trait while haemophilia is X-linked recessive trait.
Sickle cell anaemia is blood disorder while haemophilia is the disorder of blood clotting.
